Name: Moon Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% to reduce enemy defence by 1/2.

Name: Sun Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% to recover HP equal to 1/2 damage dealt.

Name: Brave Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a SPD% to trigger an additional time.

Name: Pierce Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a STR% to deal STR/2 additional damage

Name: Vengeful Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a CON% to deal your missing HP/2 undefensible damage

Name: Charged Magic
Description: When you Engage with an opponent, you have an INT% chance to deal your Might - each enemy's Defence to all enemies adjacent to your target.

Name: Waiting Block
Description: When an enemy Engages with you, you have a WIS% chance to reduce the damage you actually receive by 1/2.

Name: Lunar Impact
Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% chance to ignore enemy defence.

Name: Lunar Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a DEXx2% chance to reduce enemy Defense by 1/2.

Name: Solar Impact
Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% chance to recover HP equal to the damage you deal.

Name: Solar Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a DEXx2% chance to recover HP equal to 1/2 the damage you deal.

Name: Astral Impact
Description: Your Strikes have a DEX/2% ignore enemy defense and recover HP equal to damage dealt.

Name: Astral Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% chance to reduce enemy defence by 1/2, and recover HP equal to 1/2 damage dealt.

Name: Hero Impact
Description: Your Strikes have a SPD% to trigger 3 additional times.

Name: Hero Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a SPDx2% to trigger an additional time.

Name: Colossal Impact
Description: Your Strikes have a STR% to deal STR additional damage.

Name: Colossal Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a STRx2% to deal STR/2 additional damage.

Name: Retributive Impact
Description: Your Strikes have a CON% to deal your missing HP in undefensible damage.

Name: Retributive Strike
Description: Your Strikes have a CONx2% to deal your missing HP/2 in undefensible damage.

Name: Explosive Magic
Description: When you Engage with an opponent, you have an INT% chance to deal your Might x 1.5 - each enemy's Defence to all enemies adjacent to your target.

Name: Empowered Magic
Description: When you Engage with an opponent, you have an INTx2% chance to deal your Might - each enemy's Defence to all enemies adjacent to your target.

Name: Shielded Block
Description: When an enemy Engages with you, you have a WIS% chance to reduce the damage you actually receive to 0.

Name: Resistant Block
Description: When an enemy Engages with you, you have a WISx2% chance to reduce the damage you actually receive by 1/2.
